name: purejs-idb
author: Aleksey Magner
description: Service for managing IndexedDB local storage.

scripts.deploy: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.patch: npm run build && git add . && npm version patch --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
scripts.minor: npm run build && git add . && npm version minor --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
scripts.major: npm run build && git add . && npm version major --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
